directions: Mix the buttermilk, cucumber, beets with their juice, green onions, dill, salt, and vinegar in a bowl; stir to mix thoroughly, and chill, covered, in refrigerator at least 2 hours or overnight for best flavor. Serve cold.
ingredients: 1 cucumber - peeled, seeded, quartered lengthwise and diced
1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets with liquid
2 tablespoons white vinegar, or to taste
title: Nina's Russian Cold Beet Soup (Kholdnyk)
